hero.title: You have an incredible B2B product, but you don't know how to communicate all its value.
hero.subtitle: We help B2B tech companies clarify and differentiate their products with a clear positioning strategy to not lose sales opportunities.
hero.companiesTitle: B2B technology and SaaS companies in LatAm have already trusted Núcleo:

build.title: Your product evolved, you need repositioning and channel alignment
build.detail: Refresh the story without slowing operations, aligning sales, growth, and content teams.

brand.title: Your product is complex, it must be understood in seconds
brand.detail: Every touchpoint should explain the value without someone from your team jumping in every time.

ai.title: You're launching a new product or service
ai.detail: You need a clear narrative to announce it, test demand, and convert the right leads.

problem.label: THE PROBLEM
problem.titleRest: when you can't clearly explain what you sell, who you serve, and how you create value
problem.subtitle: Does this sound familiar?

points.one: It's hard to communicate your unique value through your site, LinkedIn, and meetings
points.two: You juggle multiple segments and struggle to decide who to talk to and what to say
points.three: You don't want to keep spending on content, ads, and outreach that don't resonate

frameworks.title: We make your product understood in your customers' language, so they say 'this is what I need' from the first interaction

steps.label: OUR SOLUTION
steps.titleLine1: This is how we'll guide you so
steps.titleLine2: you differentiate and stand out online

stage1.label: STAGE 1
stage1.title: We understand the market and spot opportunities
stage1.subtitle: We benchmark how your main competitors position themselves and capture insights from their messaging and persuasion tactics.

stage2.label: STAGE 2
stage2.title: We define the customer segments you will focus on
stage2.subtitle: Selling to B2B teams means speaking to users, decision-makers, and influencers. We prioritize who matters most so your story lands with the right people.

stage3.label: STAGE 3
stage3.title: We turn the narrative into prototypes and assets
stage3.subtitle: We craft wireframes, mockups, and visual guidelines to translate the story into your site, sales decks, and editorial content.

stage4.label: STAGE 4
stage4.title: We activate, measure, and keep improving
stage4.subtitle: We outline launch campaigns, metric dashboards, and iteration routines so your positioning stays alive in every channel.

testimonial2.quote: The positioning work they did helped us increase our conversions by 40%. Their content strategies really resonate with our target audience.

testimonial3.quote: We finally have a clear message that works across all channels. The Nucleo team perfectly understood our complexity and simplified it without losing meaning.

testimonial4.quote: Their differentiation approach helped us stand out in a very competitive market. Now our leads understand from the first contact why to choose us.

testimonial5.quote: The repositioning they did was exactly what we needed. Our sales team now has a consistent and effective message.

faq1.question: How does the work process with Núcleo work?
faq1.answer: Our process begins with a deep audit of your market and competition. Then we define key customer segments, identify your unique attributes, and develop positioning and messaging. Finally, we create the wireframe and copy for your main page aligned to your strategy.

faq2.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
faq2.answer: The time varies depending on the complexity of the project, but typically a complete positioning and messaging project takes between 8-12 weeks. This includes research, strategy development, content creation, and review of iterations.

faq3.question: Do you work with companies of all sizes?
faq3.answer: Yes, we work with B2B technology and SaaS companies of different sizes, from startups to established companies. Our approach adapts to the specific needs of each client and their growth stage.

faq4.question: What does the positioning service include?
faq4.answer: Our service includes market and competition analysis, customer segment definition, identification of unique attributes, development of positioning and key messages, and creation of wireframe and copy for your main page. Everything aligned to your business strategy.

footer.description: We transform how B2B tech companies communicate their value. We create clear messages, positioning strategies, and digital experiences that connect with your audience.
